conditions.short_description: The snowpack has become isothermal many places and stable in the mild weather in recent days. Small slabs could form in N-Iceland over the weekend.
conditions.full_description: The snowpack has become isothermal many places and stable in the mild weather in recent days. Small slabs could form in N-Iceland over the weekend.

area_forecast.forecast: The snow has settled and strengthened in the mild weather. Some new snow expected in mountains but rain at lowlands
area_forecast.snow_condition: In recent days, the snow has settled and strengthened in the mild weather. Older snow is expected to be stable but some new snow could come over the next days but rain at lowlands. The new snow could get unstable where it accumulates but only small avalanches are expected
area_forecast.weather: Áfram má búast við fremur mildu veðri en heldur kólnandi. Skúrir eða rigning á láglendi en snjókoma efst í fjöll.

area_forecast.forecast: The snow has settled and strengthened in the mild weather. Some new snow expected in mountains but rain at lowlands
area_forecast.recent_avalances: Wet slab in Naustahvilft 19th of mars
area_forecast.snow_condition: In recent days, the snow has settled and strengthened in the mild weather. Older snow is expected to be stable but some new snow could come over the next days but rain at lowlands. The new snow could get unstable where it accumulates but only small avalanches are expected
area_forecast.weather: Áfram má búast við fremur mildu veðri en heldur kólnandi. Skúrir eða rigning á láglendi en snjókoma efst í fjöll.

area_forecast.forecast: Snow has settled in warm and sunny weather the recent days, but older wind slabs might still remain at higher elevations.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Diurnal fluctuations are affecting the snowpack these days. Some softer snow or old wind slabs can be found in gullies and depressions at higher elevations. The past few days have been warm and sunny, leading to wet loose avalanches. Blowing snow occurred in the mountains on Monday, possibly accumulating in east-facing aspects. Loose snow or small wet avalanches may occur where the sun reaches and due to warming temperatures.
area_forecast.weather: Hæglætis veður og él um helgina

area_forecast.forecast: Little or no snow at low elevations and hard packed snow in the mountains. Softer snow is present in ravines and depressions.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Little or no snow is at low elevations and hard packed snow is in the mountains. Snow is considered mostly stable
area_forecast.weather: Stíf suðlæg átt en svo hæg breytilega átt og áfram fremur milt og úrkomulítið.

weather_forecast.forecast: Variable winds and snow at times at high elevations in most parts of the country.
